markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gunner's Bandolier](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1209)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 179</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This incredibly spacious bandolier can hold up to 4 one-handed crossbows or firearms that take no more than 1 action to completely reload (typically meaning that weapons with the [capacity](/Traits.aspx?ID=399) or [repeating](/Traits.aspx?ID=374) traits won't fit in the bandolier's holsters). A _gunner's bandolier_ can be etched with runes as though it were a ranged weapon. When you invest the _gunner's bandolier_, you can attune it to each of the 4 weapons holstered in it.

<document level="2" id="action-988" />

<document level="2" id="action-989" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gunner's Bandolier
